title: Still no Mystery Gift
body:
Have some of you havent received their gifts yet?
Just a question for Riot. Is it sent out by waves? people keep asking that.

replies.body: Maybe it does come in waves but anyone else having the same problem like me and Dalek?
many people haven't got theirs yet, don't worry they will give you it soon (thats if you deserve it ;)  )
Yeah I just got mine now. Though 2 of my friends are waiting for it since they havent received it and both of them havent been suspended nor restricted.
just got mine like 10 mins ago, Jurassic cho gath :D not to shabby if i say so myself. so they must come in waves
